Reviews.Title: Just great!
Reviews.Author: Virginia Rowland "Ginger"
Reviews.Content: I've  been enjoying my Dell D 620 for about 10 days now and I am very happy with it! Worked great right out of the box connected to the internet in 3 seconds! Purchased from BTG Electronics. I would recommend them for any computer purchase. They  answer any question promptly and are very helpful in making your decision. If you are like me and cannot afford a new laptop, try a refurbished one from them. Great product and reliable seller!

Reviews.Title: SURFING TOOL
Reviews.Author: BCERR
Reviews.Content: I RECIEVED THIS PRODUCT RITE AWAY. IT HAS MET MY EXPECTATION FOR A USED PC. IT WAS VERY CLEAN AND WORKS WELL. FOUND ONE MINOR FLAW, BUT IT GETS THE WORK DONE THAT IS NEEDED. GOOD SIZE. NOT TOO BULKY OR HEAVY.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude Laptop
Reviews.Author: sbayphilly
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these one for my daughter and one for myself, they both work great and were in great condition , look forward to purchasing from this co again. Good Customer service, product arrived quickly and was what was advertised.

Reviews.Title: it serves it's purpose
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: It must have been dropped because a peice of the outer casing is broken off on the corner. The DVD drive does not play DVD's, only CD's, but this may have something to do with the original video card that can't be updated. Taking it in to have it upgraded would probably cost as much as I paid for this. Have to touch the mouse pad with a delicate touch or the cursor barely moves. I bought this for my daughter because it has the software used by her school which benefits her to get homework and online assignments done. The graphics is the only dissapointment because she has to use my pc to get somethings done.

Reviews.Title: Received the product in time
Reviews.Author: Mehedi Hussain Panna
Reviews.Content: The product was shipped in time. I Received the product in time and in a good condition however the System Software is informing me to replace the battery! Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D620 Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Laptop arrived very quickly.  However, the battery was defective and would not take a charge.  Also the XP software required 70 security updates to bring it current.  I contacted seller.  They made good on the defective battery.  Product works very good now and I'm happy with it.  I would recommend this product/seller.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D620
Reviews.Author: Sharon Hudnall
Reviews.Content: The laptop works great. There was a crack on the right case but other than that I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: What a relief!
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Bought this unit to replace another refurbished D620 that kept dropping wireless signal. This one is actually cheaper but it works much better, especially due to the perfect wireless. I believe the seller does a very good job of refurbishing.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the price
Reviews.Author: Darrell G Layne
Reviews.Content: After I had it serviced it woked as well as a new one of the shelf. No Complaints. My computer service tech said it was built withhigh quality parts.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Saria Hansen "corgi muppet nut"
Reviews.Content: It got to me exactly when it was supposed to and it works perfectly. It does what I need it to.
